title: Marketplace Roundtable #89: A Correction May Be Coming, But Opportunities Abound
description: The Stock Waves team - Lyn Alden Schwartzer, Zachary Mannes, and Garret Patten - takes us through why they think the market will be higher in the next 3-5 years, and some ideas they like even as a correction beckons.
